Articles.Content: Currently sleeping/laughing/having fun while sitting on a satellite with a command seat in HKO.
mine is dead in all of my games.

First sandbox, he is one with bill and Bob and kerbin

Science, only doing no risk missions and enough parachutes to slow down to 1 m/s or so

Second sandbox, stuck in a highly elliptical orbit around kerbin ( 0.5 Mm- 50Mm) with no electricity and no forseeable change in orbit caused by minmus
Orbiting the Mun, Because the spacecraft i had used to land on the mun was only designed to orbit kerbin (My first career mode orbitor.) and on the return trip it ran out of fuel.
As of right now in my Career save, I've got Jeb on his way to the Mun to finally get around to exploring the darn thing.

Irony at its best.. see over a year ago I designed what became the first of a class of land-trains...because I lost a plane in the mountain regions outside of KSC..

Jeb was stranded and any plane sent crashed on landing.. so I made a train... this was over a year ago.. now trains for everything and no more planes

so yesterday I was modding power requirements and torque on the bogeys along with alternator output.. and accidentally created a monster..

my locomotive KSP-44 Mark 3 showed no hesistation as she climbed a hill with 4 cars.. impressed by this.. I throttled up with jeb as the driver and head towards the mountain.. yes.. those mountains..

becoming more impressed with what was done.. wheels at 1 ton each.. etc the train just kept climbing the mountain.. until she was almost vertical still climbing at 8m/s..

until I reached the top of a peak and was greeted by a sudden flat section...

KTP-44 is nothing but a fuel tank.. on many fuel tanks, hauling fuel tanks...

the underside of the mid mounted fuel tank caught the edge of the mountain.. exploded..

the locomotive split in 2.. exploding again.. following it 2 remaining fuel tankers also exploded..

Jeb... now sits in the cab.. that somehow survived with Bill and Bob..

ontop of a mountain.. stranded..with a pile of bogeys thats become a signature sign that thar once be a train here....

the very same mountain and similar position that I lost a plane a year ago

Jeb was piloting a prototype command service module to orbit (RSS) but the launcher failed to reach orbit. Jeb aborted but the fall back to earth was too steep and he was crushed by excessive G-force. He's being downloaded now...

Jeb along with Bill and Bob, plus a few others, are Heading to Duna thanks to a nice Gravity assist sling Shot:

All this was done to complete 2 contracts. One of which was a Minmus. Which helped fund the other part of the ship to help push them to Duna.
Ummmmmm... Jeb is dead, he busted a wing on his plane while taking off from the old airfield and spun into the ocean.
In an asteroid ship with claw orbiting Kerbin

where is Jebediah Kerman in your savefile?

He 's dead. He re-entered with a too high incidence angle. And burned.

The good news is that he always wanted to travel and ended spread across Kerbin's skies.

Edited March 17, 2015 by Flef
He's part of the first expedition to my LKO space station.
In an ion boat off the cost of the island with a runway

Jeb is currently manning the first Duna mission. A small station that was to land probes. However with remote tech i cant get signal to the probes. So now Jeb has to wait on a second mission to bring a lander. Bob and Bill are with him.

I always give my Orange Suiters the first shot at everything.

Dammit Jeb!

He snuck aboard an orbital construction flight that was supposed to be unmanned!

Now he's wandering around alone in a shipment of space station parts that will be heading to Tylo in 90 days. And he's supposed to be on another flight. I'm going to have to go get him.

Edited March 17, 2015 by Brainlord Mesomorph

In one of my old savefiles, Jeb was orbiting Kerbin in an elliptical orbit with an apoapsis of 2Mm (that's 2,000km, folks) and a periapsis of 100km. ... With no electric charge, and not enough fuel to get back to Kerbin even if he could start the engine. This was beginner career, so a rescue mission would not be coming anytime soon.

... I deleted that save. It was just too painful.
In a shallow crater on Dres. He first delivered an outpost on Duna and is now visiting Dres en route to the Jool system and perhaps beyond (Outer Planets Mod)

He is in a ship orbiting Kerbin known as the Pandora

it was supposed to go to Duna, but apparently it doesn't have enough dV, (miscalculation before flight)

The Kerbals at Mission Control however are thinking of turning it into the ferry for the new MÃƒÂ¼n station.

Jeb died recently in a freak climbing accident. Both of the deaths that have occurred in my career have been during survey contracts. The first was Jeb, who was trying to rush down a mountain too quickly. Next was a some other pilot, who forgot to turn on the SAS on take off in a jet and careered off the runway. I have to say I felt pretty sketchy when I immediately went back to the SPH and shoved another rookie pilot in the same aircraft design after he had surely just witnessed his colleague being blown apart by a malfunctioning aircraft.
Stuck in orbit in a Lifting Body Shuttle along with Bill, Awaiting rescue. Due to a lack of foresight, The main thrusters weren't powerful enough for anything. GAAAHH.
Sitting on the launch pad in Kerpollo 1 waiting for the launch window to mun in my first heavily modded career game..
i got to mun but the lander crashed so hes stuck

still standing on the side of the cab that once was a part of a 44 Class mk2 locomotive that was bound for bombo station outpost on a fuel train run...

a mark 3 rescue train arrived lastnight and made a 30km trip to KSC.....stupidly without jeb...hes still waiting for tonights return train
Update: He is back at the KSC (only just) getting ready for a rescue mission of the two he had to leave behind on the mun as their lander did not have enough fuel to leave.

Mine is en route to Jool, for a very special Anomaly Surveyor mission. Bob is keeping him company.

Edited March 21, 2015 by Spheniscine
